title: Oyaayiye Yaayiye lyrics Ayan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Aayiye Aayiye 
Singer: Benny Dayal, Hariharan, Chinmayi
(male - Beny dayal)

hoaaahiyeayaahi yeayaaahi yeayaaaahi
thoovum poomalai nenjile...
ovaaasame swasame vasame
vandhu maiyal kondathu yenile..

nenjukkul nulaindhu moochukkul alaindhu
 kannukkul malarkinra kanavu nee
yenkaiyil valaindhu yenmeedhu meethandhu
 salayil nadakindra nilavu nee

neeyum neeyum adi neethaana neela neela nira theethaana
theeyil theeyil vila thithikkindren naanthaana.....
neeyum neeyum adi neethaana neela neela nira theethaana
theeyil theeyil vila thithikkindren naanthaana.....

hoaaahiyeayaahi yeayaaahi yeayaaaahi thoovum poomalai nenjile...
vhovaaasame swasame vasame vandhu maiyal kondathu yenile..
nenjukkul nulaindhu moochukkul alaindhu kannukkul malarkinra kanavu nee
yenkaiyil valaindhu yenmeedhu meethandhu maalayil nadakindra nilavu nee


(male -Haricharan)
oru kannil oru kannil amudhamum maru kannil maru kannil madhuramum
sumakindra sumakindra azhakiyavale

(female -chinmayi)
oru kayil oru kayil suhangalum maru kayil maru kayil smaigalum
yenakkule kodukindra iniyavanee

ethal poovendral athil thyenyenge ingu 
poovethaan thyen thyen theyn(honey) theyn theyn
vovhooooohoooooooooooooooohoooovohhoooooooooo
hoaaahiyeayaahi yeayaaahi yeayaaaahi thoovum poomalai nenjile...
vhovaaasame swasame vasame vandhu maiyal kondathu yenile..

nenjukkul nulaindhu moochukkul alaindhu
 kannukkul malarkinra kanavu nee
yenkaiyil valaindhu yenmeedhu meethandhu
 maalayil nadakindra ninaivu nee ...

immaikatha imaikaatha kangalum 
yenakaaga yenakaaga vendi nee
unnaikandu unnaikandu rasithene..

mudhal mutham muthal mutham thandhathum 
ethal mutham ethal mutham
yenrathum athai yeni athai yeni inithenee..

sudum poongaatre suttu pogaathe 
inivaninge malichaaral poovaai .
hoaaahiyeayaahi yeayaaahi
yeayaaaahi thoovum poomalai nenjile...
vhovaaasame swasame vasame
vandhu maiyal kondathu yenile..

nenjukkul nulaindhu moochukkul alaindhu 
kannukkul malarkinra kanavu nee
yenkaiyil valaindhu yenmeedhu meethandhu
maalayil nadakindra nilavu nee ...

neeyum neeyum adi neethaana neela neela nira theethaana
theeyil theeyil vila thithikkindren naanthaana.....(repeats)

seo.title: Oyaayiye Yaayiye lyrics Ayan Song Lyrics
seo.description: Get the complete Oyaayiye Yaayiye lyrics Ayan Song Lyrics from Ayan. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Harrish Jeyaraj and sung by Benny Dayal. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pa Vijay, Ayan, Harrish Jeyaraj, Benny Dayal, Chinmayi, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
